channel.title: "How do I edit my own custom compiler?"
channel.description:
How do I edit my pimpscape compiler? I would like to turn this [code]@echo off title The Ultimate NachoPKScape Compiler v2.0 Beta javac *.java pause[/code]
So that when compile.bat is run, display something like this... (title) The Ultimate NachoPKScape Compiler v2.0 Beta! Created by Nacho, proud owner of NachoPKScape.
Press C to compile the server Press R to run the server Press E to exit this program

No , you noob thats the path

Read full topic

item.title: "How do I edit my own custom compiler?"
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Just use perfect 1.8?

EDIT: Then delete the writing and type ‘echo’ then 1 space after write what you want e.g.

echo hello this is an example
echo of a writing in a compiler
echo yay

Read full topic
item.source: "How do I edit my own custom compiler?"

item.title: "How do I edit my own custom compiler?"
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

here my compiler i made its not iys not brilliant but it works


CLS

:index
	
CLS
@COLOR 0c
@Title my compiler by eekz
	
@ECHO By eekz
	
@ECHO 
	
	
@ECHO 
	
@ECHO Type 1 to run the server
	
@ECHO Type 2 to compile	
	
@ECHO Type 3 to load the mopar client	
	
@ECHO Type 4 to load hamachi	
	
@ECHO Type 5 to load no-ip	
	
@SET option=
	
@ECHO 
	
@ECHO off
	
SET /p option=What Do You Choose? 
	
if %option%==1 goto run
	
if %option%==2 goto c

if %option%==3 goto mc
	
if %option%==4 goto h

if %option%==5 goto n
	
CLS

goto info
:run

CLS
COLOR 0c
@echo off
title Run server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
	
	
CLS

goto info
:c

CLS
@echo off
Title Compiler
color 0c
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java -nowarn *.java
color 0c



pause 
CLS

goto info
:mc

CLS
@echo off
Title mopar loader
color 0c
echo Loading...
"C:\Program Files\MoparScape\MoparScape.jar
color 0c
CLS

goto info
:h

CLS
COLOR 0c
title Hamachi Starter
@echo Starting Hamachi...
"C:\Program Files\Hamachi\hamachi.exe"
CLS

goto info
:n

CLS
COLOR 0c
title No-Ip Starter
@echo Starting No-Ip...
"C:\Program Files\No-IP\duc20.exe"
CLS

Read full topic
item.source: "How do I edit my own custom compiler?"
